p.s: The structure of the text is that it is consists of four paragraphs.
The first paragraph is the informativinformative part, because there are general information about how much the translating costs are for one year in Great Britain (l. 1-2).
In the next two paragraphs the author describes his life and experiences about learning englishEnglish and in general imigrationimmigration in a new country.
The last paragraph is the appealing part of the articelarticle, because Zia directly speekspeak to the readers and wanted to tell them something.
That Rahman tries to convince the readersreader's opinion becomes clear in the last part, because he directly speeksspeaks to the readers with words you, we and us (l. 18-23).
With these words he wants to give the reader the feeling of being included and being important.

With his choice of words in line 8-10 like drugs, crime and gangs he wanted to made it clear that Bangladeshis really have a big problem, there are many people who get in contact with drugs or get in crime.
You have to choose between two lives on the one hand a normal and good life and on the other hand a life in gangs on the street and in criminal.
These are things he wanted to make clear with these words.
The author useuses aan anapheranaphora in the third paragraph.
He begun three times a sentence with the same words My parents (l. 11-14).
I think the reason why he did this was to show that his parents were really important for him and his new life in Britain.

With the metaphermetaphor in line 7 Every year Bangladeshis sit at the bottom of educational achievement he wants to explain that the BangladeshiesBangladeshis are still on a bad education level, and to show this better for the reader he used this metaphermetaphor.
In line 20 he said I believe we should with thisthese words he makemakes clear that he directly speaks to the reader and he askasks the reader to include themself and that they have to do something.
The metaphermetaphor in line 9 and 10 extremists in the mosque or the gangs in the streets is again a good way to show his message for the reader.

I think the message of his text is that there are still many problems in Britain and everywhere for immigrant, and that it is very important to learn the new language because it is the choice of try to get integrated or to live in a parallel society.
